TopicTitle: Just looking for some KSP friends

Articles.Content: So none of my friends play KSP and as much as I try and get them to like it, nothing works. I'm thinking the best place to find some players to talk to and what not would be the KSP forums so if you're interested my Steam is Victus Mortuus or if you're not running KSP through then I'm sure there'd be some way.
This was actually the worst time to ever make a thread

Nahhhh, perfect timing

Might have been cleverer to PM people your Steam name...
